definition: (bird species of China) mandarin duck (Aix galericulata)/(fig.) affectionate couple/happily married couple
mandarin duck
mandarin duck
lit. mandarin ducks playing in the water/fig. to make love
wild mandarin duck/(derog.) illicit lovers/unorthodox couple
taking a bath together as a couple
Mandarin ducks and butterfly (i.e. love birds)/derogatory reference to populist and romantic writing around 1900
Mandarin ducks and butterfly (i.e. love birds) literary school around 1900, criticized as populist and romantic by socialist realists
"mandarin ducks" pot (hot pot with a divider, containing spicy soup on one side, mild soup on the other)

sentences.english: The occurrence of "the Mandarin Duck and Butterfly Schools" is a kind of meaningful "phenomenon".
sentences.chinese: 民初“鸳鸯蝴蝶派”是一种很有意味的“现象”。

sentences.english: Natural beauties collocation, only envy mandarin duck not envy immortal.
sentences.chinese: 天生才子佳人搭配，只羡鸳鸯不羡神仙。

sentences.english: This is Jiangjun Cliff. On the right, it is Yuanyang waterfall.
sentences.chinese: 这是将军岩，在右边是鸳鸯瀑布。

sentences.english: The Mandarin duck is a medium-size perching duck , closely related to the North American wood duck .
sentences.chinese: 鸳鸯属于栖鸭的一种，个头中等，接近于北美的木鸭。

sentences.english: Kam Mandarin CD sleeves, emerald yellow decals.
sentences.chinese: 鸳鸯裁锦袖，翡翠帖花黄。

sentences.english: We can eat a Chinese Fondue.
Be had by a few to love fine people who yearns for that bename as "Sweethearts bird ".
sentences.chinese: 被一些对爱情有美好向往的人取名“鸳鸯树”。

sentences.english: Mandarin ducks playing in the water, they left the hotel.
sentences.chinese: 鸳鸯戏水后，他们离开了旅馆。
鸳鸯吃了毒药中毒而死。

sentences.english: See the pair of mandarin ducks?

sentences.chinese: 鸳鸯做出求偶表示然后进行交配。

sentences.english: Some tourist stood on the prow, but few of them noticed the precious ducks among the vessels and boats.
sentences.chinese: 只是很少有人注意到大船与小船之间的鸳鸯。

sentences.english: She said would-old, the roots will die.
sentences.chinese: 她说鸳鸯会老，红颜会死。

sentences.english: Cold duck on the bridge painting exposed.
For you want to die with me like Romeo and Juliet.
sentences.chinese: 你想跟我一起死，做一对同命鸳鸯。

sentences.english: In the zoo pond, the mandarin ducks are swimming in pairs.
sentences.chinese: 动物园的池塘里，鸳鸯正在成双成对地戏水。
